title: Chroma Packs and champion experience system
body:
Just before I get into this I would like to mention that this is not my own idea.

Quite the amount of my friends don't like the new chroma pack option, some reasons being they would rather not spend so much RP on a bundle of "skins" that look just like the base splash art except fiddled with on paint. That new system on champion experience is (I believe I haven't actually looked into it) a skill level for champion kinda thing, for example you do well as Blitzcrank for 100 games you get 50 levels and people know you're badass at blitz. What about merging the two ideas of chroma packs and this champion experience system? for example, hitting level 50 on Blitzcrank would unlock the red Blitzcrank option and everyone would think you're a badass whilst playing with you.

Again, not my idea but I think it's great.

replies.body: But that doesn't make them money, riot like money.
